00014 #ifndef BOOST_TT_IS_ARRAY_HPP_INCLUDED
00015 #define BOOST_TT_IS_ARRAY_HPP_INCLUDED
00016 
00017 #include "boost/type_traits/config.hpp"
00018 
00019 #ifdef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00020 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/yes_no_type.hpp"
00021 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/wrap.hpp"
00022 #endif
00023 
00024 #include <cstddef>
00025 
00026 // should be the last #include
00027 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_def.hpp"
00028 
00029 namespace boost {
00030 
00031 #ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00032 
00033 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_array,T,false)
00034 #if !defined(BOOST_NO_ARRAY_TYPE_SPECIALIZATIONS)
00035 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_2(typename T,std::size_t N,is_array,T[N],true)
00036 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_2(typename T,std::size_t N,is_array,T const[N],true)
00037 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_2(typename T,std::size_t N,is_array,T volatile[N],true)
00038 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_2(typename T,std::size_t N,is_array,T const volatile[N],true)
00039 #if !(defined(__BORLANDC__) && (__BORLANDC__ < 0x600))
00040 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_array,T[],true)
00041 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_array,T const[],true)
00042 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_array,T volatile[],true)
00043 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_array,T const volatile[],true)
00044 #endif
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #else // BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00048 
00049 namespace detail {
00050 
00051 using ::boost::type_traits::yes_type;
00052 using ::boost::type_traits::no_type;
00053 using ::boost::type_traits::wrap;
00054 
00055 template< typename T > T(* is_array_tester1(wrap<T>) )(wrap<T>);
00056 char BOOST_TT_DECL is_array_tester1(...);
00057 
00058 template< typename T> no_type is_array_tester2(T(*)(wrap<T>));
00059 yes_type BOOST_TT_DECL is_array_tester2(...);
00060 
00061 template< typename T >
00062 struct is_array_impl
00063 { 
00064     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = 
00065         sizeof(::boost::detail::is_array_tester2(
00066             ::boost::detail::is_array_tester1(
00067                 ::boost::type_traits::wrap<T>()
00068                 )
00069         )) == 1
00070     );
00071 };
00072 
00073 #ifndef BOOST_NO_CV_VOID_SPECIALIZATIONS
00074 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_array,void,false)
00075 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_array,void const,false)
00076 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_array,void volatile,false)
00077 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_array,void const volatile,false)
00078 #endif
00079 
00080 } // namespace detail
00081 
00082 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_array,T,::boost::detail::is_array_impl<T>::value)
00083 
00084 #endif // BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00085 
00086 } // namespace boost
